about_the_game:
The "Artbook" DLC for CABALL is a collection of illustrations, concept art, and other materials created by the game's artists. "Artbook" contains about 50 pages. Here you can find both character images and various gameplay elements.

In addition, DLC includes several exclusive illustrations. This makes the Artbook not just a collection of pictures, but a valuable source of information about the game's creation.

For players, this DLC is an opportunity to see early character designs and graphics not included in the release version of the game.

Features

  • A collection of illustrations from the game
  • Sketches
  • The endless love of authors

The artbook is a PDF file. You can find it inside your Steam game folder. For example:
C:\Program Files\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\CABALL\ArtBook
